<h3 id="X22836">X(22836) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: K798E TO EXCENTERS-MIDPOINTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+c^2)*a+b^3+c^3)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22836) = 3*X(1)+X(6765) = 9*X(1)-X(11519) = 5*X(1)-X(12629) = X(2136)+3*X(16200) = 3*X(3158)+X(7982) = X(3189)+3*X(5603) = 3*X(3576)+X(11523) = 3*X(4421)-X(12702) = 3*X(4930)+X(12702) = 5*X(8227)-X(12625) = 3*X(10246)-X(12513) = 3*X(10247)-X(10912) = 3*X(11235)-5*X(18493) = 3*X(11236)-X(18525)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(442).</p>
<p>X(22836) lies on these lines:
{1,2}, {3,758}, {4,6326}, {20,5538}, {21,5692}, {30,18243}, {35,3869}, {36,3868}, {40,6876}, {46,4084}, {48,22021}, {55,3878}, {56,214}, {57,12559}, {63,3612}, {65,5440}, {72,993}, {79,17579}, <p>
X(22836) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 3811}, {3, 12635}, {946, 12437}, {1482, 3913}, {4421, 4930}<br>
X(22836) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3813, 5901), (11260, 15178)<br>
X(22836) = inverse of X(5529) in the hexyl circle<br>
X(22836) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 2, 30143), (1, 78, 10), (1, 997, 1125), (1, 3216, 3924), (1, 3632, 4861), (1, 3870, 3244), (1, 5312, 17016), (1, 5313, 5262), (1, 19861, 551), (8, 498, 10), (35, 4867, 3869), (55, 5730, 3878), (145, 5552, 10573), (3935, 4861, 3632), (5552, 10573, 10), (6737, 13411, 10)<br>
</p>
